definitions.title: n.[f.] pl.
definitions.body: Job 38:31 v. sub [[ענד]]; p. 772 [[מַעֲדַנּׂת]] 1Sa 15:32 is dub.; = above, as adv. acc. in bonds, fetters, Ki Gr Klo; Targum Sym Dr assign to √ [[עדן]] = delicately, voluptuously; but LXX tre/mwn, whence Lag:Proph. Chald. li prop. [[מְעׂדַנִּת]] (cf. [[אֲחׂרַנִּית]]) √ [[מעד]] = totteringly, so HPS.
